## Translator.getDeleteSql() method

生成增删改sql

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected getDeleteSql(notNeedAlias?: boolean): [string, unknown, unknown[]];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  notNeedAlias | boolean | _(Optional)_ 不需要别名 |

\[string, unknown, unknown\[\]\]
